name: ERAD 2016 Open Software Course
tagline: All you need to know about the upcoming short course on community radar software at ERAD 2016
body:
### Welcome to the short course on community radar software at ERAD 2016
On this page, you will soon find all the information related to course.

### Registration 
Watch the ERAD homepage on [ERAD Short Course page](http://erad2016.org/short-courses/). It'll provide the registration form, soon. Beware that the maximum number of participants is limite to 30.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
